active_skill.name: Shock Sniper
active_skill.description:
Unleashes an EM cannon attack on the enemy, dealing Electric DMG and accumulating Electric Anomaly Buildup.

DMG Multiplier:
768%/819%/870%/921%/972%

Daze Multiplier: 
280%/299%/317%/336%/355%

Cooldown 16s

additional_ability.name: Electromancer
additional_ability.description: When there are at least 2 Electric Attribute characters in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack inflicts 100%/125%/150%/175%/200% more Anomaly Buildup.

chain_attack.name: High-Voltage Resistance
chain_attack.description:
Unleash a strong electric attack on all nearby enemies in a large area, dealing Electric DMG and inflicting massive Electric Anomaly Buildup.

DMG Multiplier:
1032%/1100%/1169%/1238%/1307%

Daze Multiplier: 
147%/156%/166%/176%/186%
